website_summaries.verdict: Portable gas grill that sits on a convenient cart so you don't have to stoop to use it.
pros: Having a cart with wheels attached to this grill makes it very easy to use
Offers 2 burners that distribute the heat evenly across the cooking surface
Cart and grill fold down to a very thin size, making it easy to store this model when not in use
cons: You're going to pay quite a bit for this model versus other portables

customer_reviews.title: No real issues that would significantly detract from this grill
customer_reviews.text: It fires up and heats very evenly; can get up on sear temperature rapidly. Its a keeper for sure. You will find yourself turning to this instead of firing up your large Weber! The best point of all, in my opinion, is that it has two burners thus it will allow you to cook indirectly. Sear your chicken or ribs, then turn off the heat under them and finish slow cooking indirectly with the other burner turned down low. Hook this grill up to a 20lb propane tank and it will cook "forever." Six Stars I am extremely pleased with this grill.
customer_reviews.author: GearHead48

customer_reviews.title: Fantistic Little Grill
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our condo patio. It is an excellent little grill. Solid. Gets to 500 degrees in no time. Folds down easily. So nice to only have to use the little propane tanks rather than the giant ones. Plenty of space for 6 kabobs. One note- If you compress the grill and store it vertically (which it was designed to do), residual grease will seep out onto the ground. If you're concerned about staining, I would recommend a grill mat (yes, they exist!) be placed underneath..
customer_reviews.author: GreatCook

customer_reviews.title: Don't get the stand. Poorly designed wheels.
customer_reviews.text: I love this grill and would give it a higher rating but I really dislike the wheel set up. The end grips or clams they provide to keep the wheels in tack are cheap and chintzy and pop off. I can't believe Napoleon couldn't come up with a better design or solution. I would order the grill without the stand.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T Wilger

customer_reviews.title: Great grill
customer_reviews.text: I have used this item for 4 months at this point; and i am very happy with the build and quality of the grill. Some people laugh at the size of this grill, but it feeds a family summer dinner of 4-5 ppl with no problem. Item is easy to clean; heats and chars well. The only negative item to report is that there is really no low heat size on the grill, despite lowering one burner. Far better then any box store product that we have tried over the years.
customer_reviews.author: NYC Mechi

customer_reviews.title: Great thus far
customer_reviews.text: Delivered fast with box in good shape. Easy set up in about 15 minutes. Used about 10-15 times on two long weekend camping trips, and everything is working well. Thus far easy to operate, igniter lights every time, and cooks well and fast. Good in the wind . Nice grease drip pan that cleans easily, just remember to clean it prior to folding it up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a gift for our best friends when they bought a new fifth wheel. They use it when traveling and st home. As a matter of fact, they are getting rid of their regular gas grill at home in favor of using this one all the time!
customer_reviews.author: John L. Rigg

customer_reviews.title: Quality Travel Grill
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for RVing, reasonable weight for a gas grill with dolly. The temperature reached a cooking level very quickly, on par with our home Weber Genesis. We bought a low pressure quick connect hose to tap into our RV gas supply, no need for additional tanks or canisters. Excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S.

customer_reviews.title: Well built, sturdy, great tailgate grill
customer_reviews.text: The grill is great for tailgating. Assembly took minutes. Stores vertically so that’s a bonus. I had to replace my Coleman after only a few seasons. The components of this grill are much higher quality, so hoping it will last a lot longer!
customer_reviews.author: Don Koubsky Jr.

customer_reviews.title: love this little Grille.
customer_reviews.text: This grille is the perfect size for me and my wife. for a large family it may be too small. I have nothing bad to say about it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Butler

customer_reviews.title: This grill is great. Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This grill is great. Perfect size, easy transporting and very sturdy. Heats quickly and is easy to clean. grill surface is easy to clean. great for camping or tailgate parties.
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Love this grill, it's just the right size as I'm normally only cooking for two. Easy to move in and out of the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: EXCEPTIONAL QUALITY MAKES A GREAT TAILGATING GRILL
customer_reviews.text: Good quality grill that will last a long time. This is my first year using it but its made well and should last for years!
customer_reviews.author: Memphis Music Man

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Barbecuing!
customer_reviews.text: Into the second year and no problems. I bought the cover as well.
customer_reviews.author: Linnymc

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and large cooking area
customer_reviews.text: Really like our Napoleon barbeque for our small condo deck. We have had great meals: salmon, steak, halibut and veggies. So easy to clean and prefer the small canisters compared to the large propane canisters.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for RV
customer_reviews.text: I use the grill with a copper cooking mat and it’s great
customer_reviews.author: RichD5356

customer_reviews.title: Was very pleased with the unit
customer_reviews.text: Was very pleased with the unit, being able to adjust the flame on each side makes it perfect for cooking sausage and chicken, does a great job on steaks too. The grill is a bit more to clean than a charcoal grill but its not bad. I found out cooking ribs on this unit with the barbecue sauce was a lot of work to clean off the grill. On my charcoal Weber grill it burns off easy but on this grill it sticks hard and sticks on the lower section which is hard to clean. Overall a great grill.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Schmitz

customer_reviews.title: Great little grill at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small grill and this is just right. Cooks great. Easy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Cohasa

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, sturdy construction, portable.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the quality and price of this portable grille.
customer_reviews.author: irving a.

customer_reviews.title: Great little grill with a couple of problems.
customer_reviews.text: On the plus side, this grill is just the right size and heats and cooks quickly. I love the stand which makes it easy to move around on my deck. The disappointments are that the blue color on the lid started peeling and coming off almost immediately. The other problem is the removable drip pan is made of aluminum and acidic drippings like BBQ sauce has corroded holes in the pan. This part really must be made of stainless steel to solve this problem. I'm still looking for a replacement drip pan.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty Demerson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A very good griller!!we all enjoy using it very easy to take every time with you !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A perfect grill that's very portable
customer_reviews.text: A perfect grill that's very portable. Also, great for the deck when you come home and want to grill a couple of steaks/chops/chicken breasts without too much hassle or prep.
customer_reviews.author: Madlien

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, just what I was looking for. I also purchased the RV hookup hose which deletes the regulator. Very easy to install and works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Ray

customer_reviews.title: Wheel assembly is poorly designed and not rugged enough for ...
customer_reviews.text: Wheel assembly is poorly designed and not rugged enough for tailgate travel. At first tailgate wheels fell off. Company response has been to ask me if I followed the assembly instructions. I did follow the assembly instructions. Company website says grill is fully assembled. They don't mention that the wheels are not fully assembled and they claim that their advertising is correct because the grill part of this grill is fully assembled.
customer_reviews.author: KSS

customer_reviews.title: 1) You need a rubber hammer to assemble the product ...
customer_reviews.text: 1) You need a rubber hammer to assemble the product. Really! 2) When using the hammer on the part that needs to be hammered, the part does not work. When companies require assembly from the customer, the company should supply the tools (and none of those tools should be a hammer).
customer_reviews.author: Apb

customer_reviews.title: nice grill for traveling in a motor coach
customer_reviews.text: nice grill for traveling in a motor coach, cooks well, has good heat. The only problem is the paint peels off the lid. supplier replaced the lid once and the second one had done the same thing.....
customer_reviews.author: LB63123

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bbq but the wheels will never stay on. It needs a different wheel system.
customer_reviews.author: Don Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Great portable grill
customer_reviews.text: Just follow the assembly instructions and wheels will be fitted firmly in their place. Use a hammer. Even cooking, easy to clean, easy to fold and store.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kraus

product_meta.title: Napoleon TQ285X-BL Portable Propane Grill with Cart, Blue
product_meta.description: Take gourmet grilling anywhere, on any terrain with the napoleon Travel tq285x portable propane grill. Innovative scissor cart design with large wheels for easy mobility and folds upright for convenient storage or can hang on a wall.
feature_bullets: 2 burner portable grill with up to 12,000 BTUs
Dual stainless steel burners for direct and indirect grilling
Porcelain zed cast iron wave cooking grids for consistent, even heat
Superior wind proof design holds the heat in

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars53 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
